queries.item: CREATE TABLE `?:bb_request_archive` ( `archive_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `user_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `request_id` int(11), `ip_address` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `timestamp` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `allow_over_max_price` tinyint(2) unsigned NOT NULL ZEROFILL, PRIMARY KEY (`archive_id`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;

CREATE TABLE `?:bb_notifications` ( `bb_notify_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `notify_string` VARCHAR(255), `user_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `ip_address` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `timestamp` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bb_notify_id`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;

CREATE TABLE `?:bb_requests` ( `bb_request_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `user_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `request_item_id` int(11), `ip_address` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `timestamp` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `allow_over_max_price` tinyint(2) unsigned NOT NULL ZEROFILL, `item_added_to_cart` tinyint(2) unsigned NOT NULL ZEROFILL, PRIMARY KEY (`bb_request_id`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;

CREATE TABLE `?:bb_request_item_archive` ( `bb_request_item_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `title` VARCHAR(50), `description` VARCHAR(500), `max_price` DECIMAL(10,2), `over_max_price` tinyint(2) unsigned NOT NULL ZEROFILL, PRIMARY KEY (`bb_request_item_id`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;

CREATE TABLE `?:bb_bids_archive` ( `bb_request_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `request_item_id` int(11), `product_id` int(11), `price` DECIMAL(10,2), `quantity` INT(11), `user_id` INT(11), PRIMARY KEY (`archive_id`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;

CREATE TABLE `?:bb_request_item` ( `bb_request_item_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `title` VARCHAR(50), `description` VARCHAR(500), `max_price` DECIMAL(10,2), `over_max_price` tinyint(2) unsigned NOT NULL ZEROFILL, PRIMARY KEY (`bb_request_item_id`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;

CREATE TABLE `?:bb_bids` ( `bb_item_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `request_id` int(11), `product_id` int(11), `price` DECIMAL(10,2), `quantity` INT(11), `user_id` INT(11), PRIMARY KEY (`bb_item_id`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;
